title: EssentialsX的旁观者模式怎么关闭
author: hua2hua
txt_content: 只要服务器有人登录，就会出现这个[20:45:31 WARN]: [Essentials] Task #50 for Essentials v2.15.0.56 generated an exception java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: SPECTATOR         at com.earth2me.essentials.utils.LocationUtil.isBlockUnsafeForUser(LocationUtil.java:227) ~[?:?]         at com.earth2me.essentials.Teleport.now(Teleport.java:122) ~[?:?]         at com.earth2me.essentials.Teleport.now(Teleport.java:104) ~[?:?]         at com.earth2me.essentials.spawn.EssentialsSpawnPlayerListener$NewPlayerTeleport.run(EssentialsSpawnPlayerListener.java:153) ~[?:?]         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71) ~[CraftTask.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:346) [CraftScheduler.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:870) [MinecraftServer.class:?]         at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:458) [lt.class:?]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:806) [MinecraftServer.class:?]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:665) [MinecraftServer.class:?]         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_191]

replies.author: TRCRedstoner
replies.txt_content: ESS版本不支持，你使用的是1.8+版本的ESS，而你的服务器是1.7的服务器
